participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Curious and energetic, always looking for ways to have fun.
participant_1.background: i'm 13 years old. i ride the bus to school. my brother is older than me. i hate math class. i'm on the soccer team.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about music, with a dedicated work ethic.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.
